column1: Wise-nose was a pony belonging to Meriadoc Brandybuck.
Wise-nose was one of five ponies that Merry had ready for the Hobbits journey at Crickhollow. At the home of Tom Bombadil
column2: the ponies became friends with Fatty Lumpkin
column3: a pony of Toms. At the Barrow-downs they became so frightened that they ran off to find Fatty. Tom called them all back with the names he had given them: Sharp-ears
column7: and White-socks.  Eventually they all returned with all the baggage
column8: and went back on their journey with the Hobbits.

column1: During their stay at the Prancing Pony the Hobbits ponies were let out by spies to delay their departure from Bree. They ran out in the Downs to find Fatty. They stayed with Tom for a while
column2: until he had heard news of the events at Bree. He sent the ponies to Barliman Butterbur
column3: where they stayed working for Barliman and were well cared for by Bob.
